titleStmt.title: SII 6.31: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 31. (A.R. No. 81 of 1897). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE NAGANATHASVAMIN TEMPLE AT TIRUNAGESVARAM, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cālai kalamaṟuttu kaṅkapāṭiyūm nuḷam
ppāṭiyūm taṭikaivaḻiyūm veṅkaiñāṭum koṇ
ṭa kovirājarājarājakesaripanmakki yāṇṭu 10 4vatu ti
runaṟaiyūrṉāṭṭu brahmadeyam nallūrc⌈
ceri sabhaiyom teṉkarait tiraimūrṉāṭṭu ⌈
tevatāṉam tiruviṇṇakart tiruṉākiśvaramuṭaiya ma
hādevaṟku cantrādityava liṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟu
kkuṭutta nilamāvana Eṅkaḷ tenṉūr Aṟumācce
yila vāykkānkaraik kāṟcceyyūm Itiṉukku
ppaṭum kaiyāṟṟukkum Ellaiyāvatu kīḻpā
ṟ kellai veṇkāṭaṉ piccaṉāḻikinṟa Aṟumā
cceykku meṟkiṉnum Aṟumācceykke te
ṟcinaṉum mātākkāṇi ciṅkanpulicai nilattukku
teṟkkinṉum Āritaṉ coman tiruveṅkaṭamum tampimāru
m nilattukku meṟkinṉum teṉpāṟk kellai Aricil
niroṭu kālukku vaṭakkum melpāṟ kellaiy Āritan ka
n piṉṉāḻikiṉṟa viḷākat
tu kiṉṉum Ivviḷākattukke kiḻakkinṉum Ivviḷākattukke vaṭa
kkiṉṉum Ivviḷākattukke kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟk kellai Aṟumāc cey vākkā
lukku teṟkum Ivvicaitta peruṉān kellaiyilum Uḷpaṭṭa nilam mikitikkuṟai
yuḷḷaṭaṅka vāykūṟṟu puḷḷiñilam pattumāvum Inna mittevaṟke cantrādityava li⌈
ṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟukkuṭutta nilam Iṭaikkaṇṭattu ṉāṉkkumāvuk kellaiyāvatukiḻpā
ṟ kellai pāratāyaṉ kaḷvaṉ pulicaiyum tamapiyumākinṟa nilattukku meṟkkum te
npāṟ kellai kuḷattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟ kellai Āritaṉ coman tiruveṅkaṭamum ta
mpiyum Āritaṉ tevan comaṉum nilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟ kellai peruvāy
kkālukku teṟkkum Ivvicaitta peruṉān kellaiyilum Uḷppaṭṭa nilam mikutikku⌈
ṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅka vāykkūṟṟu puḷḷinilam ṉānkkumāvum Inṉa mittevaṟkke cantrā
tityaval liṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟa nilam pāṟṟuṟai Akaiyāṟeṉṟu perkūvappaṭum
nilam Iraṇṭumāvukkum Ellaiyāvatu kiḻpāṟ kellai maṟuvāykku meṟkkum teṉpāṟ ⌈
kellai Aricilil niroṭu kālukku vaṭakkum melpāṟ kellai mayilāṭi Irā
maṉṉāḻikiṉṟa nilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟk kelllai Aiyaṉ koyiṟ tiṭaṭalukku
teṟkkum Ivvicaitta peruṉānkellaiyilum Uḷpaṭṭa nilam mikitikkuṟaivuḷḷa
ṭaṅka vāykkūṟṟu puḷḷinilam Iraṇṭumāvum Ākat taṭi mūnṟiṉāl veṟṟi vanta ṉilam mu
kkāle Orumā Innilam mukkāley Orumāviṉālum vanta Iṟaiy Epperpaṭṭitum nāṅkaḷ
viṟppatāka Iṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom tiruviṇṇakart tiruṉāgīśvaramuṭaiya mahā⌈
tevarkku Iṉṉilam mukkāle yorumāvūm cantrādityaval liṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttu
Emmil licaiñcu koṇṭa vilaiypporuḷp poṉkaḻañciṟppotta tuḷaippo
ṉ kumaramāttāṇṭapūrattu nakarakkallāl koṇṭa poṉ nāṟppatin kaḻañcu Ippon nāṟppati
ṉ kaḻañcum Ittevaṟkku piḷḷaiyā rarikulakesariyār tirumakaḷār Aṟiñcikaip pirāṭṭiyā
ṉa śrīpāṇapperuṉteviyār tiruviḻāvūkkum paruppūponakattukkum munniyokittu pūda
rkaḷāy Iruṉta poṉ ṉāṟppatiṉ kaḻañcum kaiccella Aṟakkoṇṭu Innilam mukkāle Oru
māvum cantrādityaval Iṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom meṟccollappaṭṭa teṉkarai ti
raimurṉāṭṭut tevatāṉan tiruviṇṇakar tiruṉāgiśvarattu mahādevarkku tirunaṟaiyūrṉāṭṭu
brahmadeyam nallūrcceri sabhaiyom sabhaiyār paṇikka Eḻutinen tirunaṟaiyūrṉāṭṭu ci
vapurattu veḻkkovan Aṇṇāttaṭikaḷ kāriyen Ivai Enneḻuttu .. Ippaṭi Aṟiven ko
śikaṉ kumāran veṇṭiyen Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ kośikaṉ kumāraṉ tirunāgīcurava
nen Ippaṭi Aṟivain kāśyapan tirunāgīśuravaṉ kuppaiyeṉ Ippaṭi yo
kkum Āritaṉ coman tiruveṅkaṭatten Ippaṭi yokkum comanaṅkiyeṉ .ippa
ṭi yokkum matārakkāṇic ciṅkaṉ puricayen .. Ippaṭi yokkum Āritan comanaṅkiyen .
Ippaṭi yokkum Āritan tevan comanen .-paruppu ponakattukku nilamā
vana pāratāyakuṭi mukacoḻan puḷḷiviḷākattu pattum nallūrcceri A
ṟumāvum Ivvāykkāṟ karaiy nilam kālum Itaṉukkuppaṭum pūñ⌈
cai perilum Innum Iṭaikkaṇṭattu nilam nāṅku māvū
lam Oṉṟe nāṉku mā Itanāṟ ceyum nivantam pūrik
kutta larici Aiññāḻiyūm tūpparuppū munnāḻi
yum kaṟiyamitu Oṉṟum neyyamitu Āḻākkum
Aṭaikkāyamutu ṉālum veṟṟilaiyamitu patināṟum Ipparicu nivantam ce
yvatu . tiruviḻāppūṟattukku nilamāvana pāratāyakuṭi mun conta muṟaipattenṟu pe
r kūvappaṭum nilam veliyūm nallūrcceri muna conṉa pāṟṟuṟai yakaiyāṟṟu
nilam Iraṇṭumāvūvūmāṇa ttu vaṭaittom Itukku Iyanṟavāṟu tiruvi
ḻāc ceyvatu māheśvara ratṣai .
Digital edition of SII 6.31 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
